author: IRTPJ
title: Join Religious Leaders and the LA Community on June 2 for the 9th Annual Interfaith Solidarity March Los Angeles | Israel/Hamas Conflict | channel3000.com
text: Madison LOS ANGELES, Calif., May 31, 2024 (SEND2PRESS NEWSWIRE) -- Join the Interfaith Solidarity March organized by the Institute for Religious Tolerance Peace & Justice in partnership with dozens of marches around the world. Let us walk together to affirm freedom, diversity, and respect among individuals, nations, ethnicities, and religions, as we learn to live in peace. This significant event aims to foster unity, peace, and understanding among different faith communities while addressing pressing issues in Gaza and Israel. Sorry, an error occurred.
